hadith.text: Narrated Mu'awiyah: AbuMijlaz said: Mu'awiyah went out to Ibn az-Zubayr and Ibn Amir. Ibn Amir got up and Ibn az-Zubayr remained sitting. Mu'awiyah said to Ibn Amir: Sit down, for I heard the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) say: Let him who likes people to stand up before him prepare his place in Hell
